options.name: Create A Mailing List
options.action: Create A Mailing List Email Mail Group
options.description: Creates a mailing list. API reference documentation: [Create a mailing list]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/mail-v1/mailgroup/create)

options.name: Obtain Mailing Lists In Batch
options.action: Obtain Mailing Lists In Batch Email Mail Group
options.description: Obtains mailing lists by pages. API reference documentation: [Obtain mailing lists in batch]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/mail-v1/mailgroup/list)

options.name: Obtain A Mailing List
options.action: Obtain A Mailing List Email Mail Group
options.description: Obtains the information of a mailing list. API reference documentation: [Obtain a mailing list]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/mail-v1/mailgroup/get)

options.name: Modify A Mailing List
options.action: Modify A Mailing List Email Mail Group
options.description: Updates some fields of a mailing list. The fields not specified are not updated. API reference documentation: [Modify a mailing list]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/mail-v1/mailgroup/patch)

options.name: Update A Mailing List
options.action: Update A Mailing List Email Mail Group
options.description: Updates all information of a mailing list. API reference documentation: [Update a mailing list]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/mail-v1/mailgroup/update)

options.name: Delete A Mailing List
options.action: Delete A Mailing List Email Mail Group
options.description: Deletes a mailing list. API reference documentation: [Delete a mailing list]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/mail-v1/mailgroup/delete)

options.name: Create A Mailing List Member
options.action: Create A Mailing List Member Email Mail Group Member
options.description: Adds a member to a mailing list. API reference documentation: [Create a mailing list member]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/mail-v1/mailgroup-member/create)

options.name: Obtain Mailing List Members In Batch
options.value: Obtain Mailing List Members In Batch
options.action: Obtain Mailing List Members In Batch Email Mail Group Member
options.description: Obtains the list of mailing list members by pages. API reference documentation: [Obtain mailing list members in batch]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/mail-v1/mailgroup-member/list)

options.name: Obtain Mailing List Member Information
options.action: Obtain Mailing List Member Information Email Mail Group Member
options.description: Obtains the information of a mailing list member. API reference documentation: [Obtain mailing list member information]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/mail-v1/mailgroup-member/get)

options.name: Delete A Mailing List Member
options.action: Delete A Mailing List Member Email Mail Group Member
options.description: Deletes a mailing list member. API reference documentation: [Delete a mailing list member]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/mail-v1/mailgroup-member/delete)

options.name: Create A Member Who Can Send Emails To Mailing List Addresses
options.value: Create A Member Who Can Send Emails To Mailing List Addresses
options.action: Create A Member Who Can Send Emails To Mailing List Addresses Email Mail Group Permission Member
options.description: Adds a member with custom permission to the mailing list, who will then be able to send emails to this mailing list. API reference documentation: [Create a member who can send emails to mailing list addresses]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/mail-v1/mailgroup-permission_member/create)

options.name: Obtain The Members Who Can Send Emails To Mailing List Addresses In Batch
options.value: Obtain The Members Who Can Send Emails To Mailing List Addresses In Batch
options.action: Obtain The Members Who Can Send Emails To Mailing List Addresses In Batch Email Mail Group Permission Member
options.description: Obtains the list of members who can send emails to mailing list addresses by pages. API reference documentation: [Obtain the members who can send emails to mailing list addresses in batch]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/mail-v1/mailgroup-permission_member/list)

options.name: Obtain A Member Who Can Send Emails To Mailing List Addresses
options.value: Obtain A Member Who Can Send Emails To Mailing List Addresses
options.action: Obtain A Member Who Can Send Emails To Mailing List Addresses Email Mail Group Permission Member
options.description: Obtains the information of a member who can send emails to mailing list addresses. API reference documentation: [Obtain a member who can send emails to mailing list addresses]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/mail-v1/mailgroup-permission_member/get)

options.name: Delete A Member Who Can Send Emails To Mailing List Addresses
options.value: Delete A Member Who Can Send Emails To Mailing List Addresses
options.action: Delete A Member Who Can Send Emails To Mailing List Addresses Email Mail Group Permission Member
options.description: Deletes a member with custom permission, who will then be unable to send emails to this mailing list. API reference documentation: [Delete a member who can send emails to mailing list addresses]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/mail-v1/mailgroup-permission_member/delete)

options.name: Create A Mailing List Alias
options.action: Create A Mailing List Alias Email Mail Group Alias
options.description: Creates a mailing list alias. API reference documentation: [Create a mailing list alias]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/mail-v1/mailgroup-alias/create)

options.name: Obtain All Mailing List Aliases
options.action: Obtain All Mailing List Aliases Email Mail Group Alias
options.description: Obtains all mailing list aliases. API reference documentation: [Obtain all mailing list aliases]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/mail-v1/mailgroup-alias/list)

options.name: Delete A Mailing List Alias
options.action: Delete A Mailing List Alias Email Mail Group Alias
options.description: Deletes a mailing list alias. API reference documentation: [Delete a mailing list alias]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/mail-v1/mailgroup-alias/delete)

options.name: Create A Public Mailbox
options.action: Create A Public Mailbox Email Public Mailbox
options.description: Creates a public mailbox. API reference documentation: [Create a public mailbox]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/mail-v1/public_mailbox/create)

options.name: Obtain Public Mailboxes In Batch
options.action: Obtain Public Mailboxes In Batch Email Public Mailbox
options.description: Obtains the list of public mailboxes by pages. API reference documentation: [Obtain public mailboxes in batch]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/mail-v1/public_mailbox/list)

options.name: Obtain A Public Mailbox
options.action: Obtain A Public Mailbox Email Public Mailbox
options.description: Obtains public mailbox information. API reference documentation: [Obtain a public mailbox]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/mail-v1/public_mailbox/get)

options.name: Modify A Public Mailbox
options.action: Modify A Public Mailbox Email Public Mailbox
options.description: Updates some fields of a public mailbox. The fields not specified are not updated. API reference documentation: [Modify a public mailbox]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/mail-v1/public_mailbox/patch)

options.name: Update A Public Mailbox
options.action: Update A Public Mailbox Email Public Mailbox
options.description: Updates all information of a public mailbox. API reference documentation: [Update a public mailbox]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/mail-v1/public_mailbox/update)

options.name: Create A Public Mailbox Member
options.action: Create A Public Mailbox Member Email Public Mailbox Member
options.description: Adds a member to a public mailbox. API reference documentation: [Create a public mailbox member]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/mail-v1/public_mailbox-member/create)

options.name: Obtain Public Mailbox Members In Batch
options.value: Obtain Public Mailbox Members In Batch
options.action: Obtain Public Mailbox Members In Batch Email Public Mailbox Member
options.description: Obtains the list of public mailbox members by pages. API reference documentation: [Obtain public mailbox members in batch]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/mail-v1/public_mailbox-member/list)

options.name: Obtain Public Mailbox Member Information

options.name: Delete A Public Mailbox Member
options.action: Delete A Public Mailbox Member Email Public Mailbox Member
options.description: Deletes a member of a public mailbox. API reference documentation: [Delete a public mailbox member]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/mail-v1/public_mailbox-member/delete)

options.name: Clear Public Mailbox Members
options.action: Clear Public Mailbox Members Email Public Mailbox Member
options.description: Deletes all members of a public mailbox. API reference documentation: [Clear public mailbox members]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/mail-v1/public_mailbox-member/clear)

options.name: Create A Public Mailbox Alias
